prompt.0: Please translate the following news text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Keep the original tone of the text. Examples: German = "Beamte" -> English = "officers", German = "Taschendiebe" -> English = "pickpockets", German = "ermitteln" -> English = "investigating", German = "Fälle" -> English = "cases", German = "Woche" -> English = "week". Here is the text: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0: "The some 1,400 officers deployed have taken six suspected pickpockets into custody and are now investigating several cases of assault and sexual crimes. Specific crime figures for the start of the carnival will be available next week."

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
